already_paired: This device has already been paired.
autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
country_code_message: Set the country code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
end_port_invalid: End port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
factory_reset_message: Warning, this can not be undone.
home_pin_message: The PIN used when adding Homebridge to Apple Home.
home_username_message: The username Apple Home uses to identify Homebridge.
homekit_disconnect: You will be disconnected from Apple Home.
hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
invalid_port_range: Invalid port range the ending port must be greater then the starting port.
latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
name: Name
polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
postal_code_message: Set the postal code to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
range_name_message: A port range description used to identify the port range.
server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
service_description_message: Used with the name to help identify the Homebridge on the system.
service_name_message: Used to identify the Homebridge service on the system.
service_port_invalid: Service port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
service_port_message: The port Homebridge runs on, the default is 51826.
start_port_invalid: Start port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
temp_units_message: Set the units you want temprature sensors to display.
time_format_message: This only affects times in the interface.
